query:
UPDATE comments
            SET 
                entity_id = $2,
                author = $3,
                text = $4,
                data = $5,
                moderated_at = CASE
                    WHEN $7 THEN COALESCE(moderated_at, NOW())
                    ELSE NULL
                END,
                moderated_by = CASE
                    WHEN $7 THEN COALESCE(moderated_by, $6)
                    ELSE NULL::uuid
                END
            WHERE id = $1
            RETURNING id, entity_id, author, text, data, created_at, updated_at, moderated_at, moderated_by
